The purpose of the patent is to provide a device for coating continuous webs with regulable coating strength by means of a doctor rod that rests against the coated side of the web, that is mounted in a doctor bed, and that can be elastically forced with regulable pressure against the web being coated. The doctor rod is a doctor batten that moves with little friction along at least one overflow-side slide face of a rigid doctor bed. The face of the doctor batten toward the web that is being coated is rectangular and demarcates in conjunction with the web a narrowing coating-material application gap with a geometry that depends on the degree of contact pressure. The upper edge of the face constitutes a straight and sharp stripping edge. The face and stripping edge of the doctor batten are flexible. Its face is highly resistant to wear.
